titles.title: Marijuana Misdemeanor Expungement Act

To amend Federal law to create expungement mechanism and a process to petition for an expungement for low-level violations of the Controlled Substances Act as it relates to marijuana, to study the impact of expungements issued, and for other purposes.
Marijuana Misdemeanor Expungement Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
Marijuana Misdemeanor Expungement Act
This bill establishes a process to expunge criminal records related to certain federal marijuana offenses.
